crypto.//: String value for the minimum TLS version to use
If not supplied, Kurento will try and resolve the highest supported version of TLS
List of ciphers to use.  If not supplied, then the default set of ciphers from OpenSSL will be used.
Formatted as a colon delimited list.  See https://www.openssl.org/docs/manmaster/man1/ciphers.html0

resources.//: KMS will raise an error when reaching this usage% of Kernel resources
Applies to allowed number of threads, and number of open file descriptors
KMS process will be automatically killed when there are no sessions but this % of resources are in use
Whether to disable the RPC API request cache, for memory constrained environments

websocket.//: Try (or not) to use IPv6 for the WebSocket connection, with IPv4 fallback
WebSocket port where API clients connect to control KMS
Set to 0 or comment out the line to disable WebSocket access

secure.//: Secure WebSocket port where API clients connect to control KMS
Set to 0 or comment out the line to disable Secure WebSocket access
Path (absolute or relative to this config file) to the
concatenated certificate (chain) file(s) + private key, in PEM format
Password for the private key, if one was set when the key was created

websocket.//: Maximum queue length of pending connections (see sysctl tcp_max_syn_backlog)
